Text: November 6, 2016 at 10:31 pm   humans are stupid, especially Amerikkkans. while the sheep continue to consume irrelevant trinkets in there capitalistic society like sheep grazin on grass in an enclosed field, Russia is preparin to crush Amerikkka with a iron gauntlet. China, N.Korea, and Iran will play there parts too. it wont be this year, it wont be next year, and likely not even 2018, but by 2019, somethin really bad is goin to happen. mark my words.ï»¿
